full_summary:
**Tender Announcement**

**Supply Arrangement:**
W8485-184741 Series - Aviation Replacement Parts

**Request for Proposal**

The Department of National Defence is seeking qualified suppliers to provide aviation replacement parts under the Supply Arrangement W8485-184741 Series. The Department has issued a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the procurement of 1 item(s) for the CT114.

**Eligible Suppliers**
Only qualified Supply Arrangement (SA) Holders of Supply Arrangement W8485-184741 Series are eligible to submit a proposal. The following companies have been invited to participate:

* Simex Defence Inc.
* Tower Aerospace Inc.
* Unisource Technology Inc.
* L3 Technologies MAS Inc.
* Canada West Avionics
* Tronosjet Maintenance Inc.
* Tulmar Safety
* Honeywell Ltd
* Rockwell Collins Canada
* TSL Aerospace Technologies

**Tender Details**

* Solicitation Number: W8485-237157/B
* Tender Closing Date: 2022-11-22T14:00:00
* Publication Date: 2022-11-09

**Contact Information**

For inquiries regarding this RFP requirement, please contact:

* Ryan Duncan, Aerospace Equipment Program Management (DGAEPM)
* Department of National Defence (DND) / Government of Canada
* Telephone: (undefined)
* Email: [ryan.duncan@forces.gc.ca](mailto:ryan.duncan@forces.gc.ca)
* Address: 455, Boulvard de la carrière, Gatineau (QC) J8Y 6V7

**Note**
A Notice will be posted at least once a year on the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) to allow more Suppliers to become qualified for Supply Arrangement W8485-184741 Series. Suppliers interested in becoming qualified should submit their request to Samantha Coles, Supply Team Leader, at [samantha.coles@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:samantha.coles@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca).

This tender announcement was published in the following languages:

* English
* French

*Government of Canada | Public Services and Procurement Canada Land and Aerospace Equipment Procurement and Support Sector*  
455, Boulvard de la carrière, Gatineau (QC) J8Y 6V7

Note: On-going Opportunity for Qualification

Please review the following mandatory documents and get them before responding to this tender
